document.full_text: a package found by a security guard at a federal office building in detroit sat three weeks before someone thought to screen it and found it was a bomb, an official who represents unionized guards said on wednesday.
document.title: bomb undiscovered for weeks at detroit fed building: union chief
lines_and_colors: a package found by a security guard at a federal office building in detroit sat three weeks before someone thought to screen it and found it was a bomb, an official who represents unionized guards said on wednesday.
